name: Demon Mask
description:
Hello fellow adventurer,

Come on click on the download button and join Garett on his mysterious adventure.

In this wondeful world of Argwin you gonna join Garett to solve the murder of the king's brother which resultet in Garett to get captured, while he was on a mission to steal a rare demon mask from the king which he didn't know. To get free you must go on a wild adventure and solve another mystery because the murderer is coming from another nation who is living in the deep's of Mount Zharkiv.

But be aware you have some powerful powers who are getting evoked which you did not know exist in yourself.

Controls

            Keyboard  / Controller

Move:             / Bumper left or right

Jump:     Space    /  Button South

Dash:          Q      /  Right Trigger

Slide:          Y       /   Left Trigger

Shoot:         W    /   Button West

Interact       E     /   Button South

Special thanks to:

Mirage.Z for helping me with my Assets

Epidemicsound for Music
